text: Ezɨ Atrivim Asa, Judan anabamɨn 300,000plan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko Benjaminɨn anabamɨn 280,000plan mɨdorozir gumaziba iti. Judan anabamɨn gumaziba, me afuziba ko oraba suisi, ezɨ Benjaminɨn anabamɨn gumaziba, me orar doziba ko piba ko baribar suisi. Gumazir kaba me bar gavgavigha mɨsoghamin araziba bar adagh fo.
